what is RMPY¶

RMPY it is a set of functions and classes that make easy to do rigging in maya. It is a structured way to create rigs using an architecture that simplifies and makes clear the creation of rigs.

Getting started¶

First you should understand how the architecture is structured and the different parts that conform a rig.
